text: 4 Real may refer to: * 4 Real, a phrase the musician Richey Edwards, of Manic Street Preachers, cut into his arm in 1991 * 4 Real (album), by Crystal Kay, 2003 * "4 Real", a song by Avril Lavigne from Goodbye Lullaby * 4Real, a 2008 American TV series ==See also== * 4Real 4Real, a 2019 album by YG * For Real (disambiguation)
title: 4 Real
